espnscrapeR 0.5.1
  • Reference

Scrape weekly NFL leaders stats from ESPN

Source: R/scrape_weekly_leaders.R
scrape_weekly_leaders.Rd

Scrape weekly NFL leaders stats from ESPN

scrape_weekly_leaders(season = 2019, week = 1, stats = "passing")

Arguments

season

character or numeric - greater than 2002
week

character or numeric - 1 to 17 for regular season
stats

character - either receiving, passing, or rushing

Value

tibble

Examples

scrape_weekly_leaders(season = 2002, stats = "passing", week = 1)

#> Scraping passing stats for week 1 from 2002 season!
#> # A tibble: 30 x 13
#>    season  week  rank name     team  result  pass_comp pass_att pass_yds pass_td

#>  1   2002     1     1 Matt Ry… ATL   L 38-2…        37       54      450       2
#>  2   2002     1     2 Aaron R… GB    W 43-3…        32       44      364       4
#>  3   2002     1     3 Philip … IND   L 27-2…        36       46      363       1
#>  4   2002     1     4 Russell… SEA   W 38-2…        31       35      322       4
#>  5   2002     1     5 Josh Al… BUF   W 27-1…        33       46      312       2
#>  6   2002     1     6 Matthew… DET   L 27-2…        24       42      297       1
#>  7   2002     1     7 Daniel … NYG   L 26-1…        26       41      279       2
#>  8   2002     1     8 Lamar J… BAL   W 38-6…        20       25      275       3
#>  9   2002     1     9 Jared G… LAR   W 20-1…        20       31      275       0
#> 10   2002     1    10 Carson … PHI   L 27-1…        24       42      270       2
